text: Ureueng meuiman lom geupubuet got Makanan pih got hana meusalah Hana jeut keupeue ateuh ureueng nyan Pajoh makanan â€˜oh lheuh geuulah Asai takwa gopnyan keu Tuhan Lom geumeuiman lagee yue Allah Bandum buet nyang got nyang geukeurija Lheuhnyan geutakwa iman keu Allah Lheuhnyan geutakwa geupubuet ihsan Buet keubajikan cit le that leupah Tuhan Neugaseh ureueng pubuet jroh Hana meusaboh pih na nyang salah
